# `FormListPicker` Definition

List picker component configuration

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Unique identifier for the list picker |
| sections | [`FormListPickerSection[]`](formlistpickersection-definition.md) | Yes | Sections in the list picker |
